sentences: Alan Meltzer (1944 â€“ October 31, 2011) was an American businessman and poker player who founded Wind-up Records along with his ex-wife Diana Meltzer.
In 1997, he purchased Grass Records with his wife Diana Meltzer and started Wind-up Records.
Meltzer died on October 31, 2011, and left a $1.5 million inheritance to his doorman and driver.
